dt-option.name: searchPanes.i18n.collapseMessage
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the Collapse button

type.description:
Setting the `-init searchPanes.i18n.collapseMessage` option to a string of your choice allows the Collapse All button to have custom text within it.
This property is passed through an `-api i18n()` function.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.i18n.collapseMessage` parameter is `"Collapse All"`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will set the message to be displayed in the Collapse button to 'Collapse All'. This property allows that message to be configured.
This option allows direct configuration on the language options for the SearchPanes instance. At this time using `language.searchPanes.collapseMessage` has the same effect as setting this option. If both are provided, this will take preference, We've made this change for consistency in our APIs moving forward.
